name: Ext_R5_MedicationAdministration_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationAdministration.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Concept, condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered
element.definition: A code, Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Concept, condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered
element.definition: A code, Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationAdministration.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A set of codes indicating the reason why the MedicationAdministration was made.
